overview: PLAVEB is a full service website design and web development company based in Los Angeles, California. PLAVEB services for small businesses include but not limited to Graphic Design, Logo Design, Web Design, Website Development, Ecommerce Store, Open Source Shopping Carts, Mobile Website Design, Mobile Apps Development, and Online Marketing. Let PLAVEB helps set your business stand out above the competition.
